name: abdullyahuza/filament-impersonate
description: Filament Impersonate allows administrators to securely impersonate other users within the Filament admin panel. With a simple "Impersonate" action, admins can log in as another user to troubleshoot issues, test permissions, or preview user-specific content. A visible banner indicates impersonation mode, with an easy one-click return to the original account.
